headline.main: UN Official Urges South Sudan to Allow Food Aid Distribution
headline.print_headline: UN Official Urges South Sudan to Allow Food Aid Distribution

lead_paragraph: The U.N. humanitarian chief is demanding immediate access for aid distribution in famine-hit South Sudan amid continued fighting and the recent looting of a humanitarian organization.
snippet: The U.N. humanitarian chief is demanding immediate access for aid distribution in famine-hit South Sudan amid continued fighting and the recent looting of a humanitarian organization....
